name: Build and Test (Windows & Ubuntu)

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, fix/openrgb-interface-entertainment ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
    strategy:
      matrix:
        os: [ubuntu-latest, windows-latest]
        arch: [x64]
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Setup build environment - Ubuntu
        if: matrix.os == 'ubuntu-latest'
        run: |
          sudo apt-get update
          sudo apt-get install -y build-essential cmake git pkg-config libmbedtls-dev libspdlog-dev nlohmann-json3-dev

      - name: Setup build environment - Windows (vcpkg)
        if: matrix.os == 'windows-latest'
        shell: pwsh
        run: |
          $vcpkgRoot = "$env:TEMP\vcpkg"
          git clone https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg.git $vcpkgRoot
          & "$vcpkgRoot\bootstrap-vcpkg.bat"
          & "$vcpkgRoot\vcpkg.exe" install mbedtls:x64-windows spdlog:x64-windows nlohmann-json:x64-windows catch2:x64-windows --triplet x64-windows

      - name: Configure CMake
        shell: bash
        run: |
          mkdir -p build
          cd build
          if [ "${{ matrix.os }}" == "ubuntu-latest" ]; then
            cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
          else
            cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE="$TEMP/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
          fi

      - name: Build
        run: |
          cd build
          cmake --build . --config Release -- -m

      - name: Run tests
        run: |
          cd build
          ctest --output-on-failure --timeout 300

      #     REPO: ${{ github.repository }}
      #     TOKEN: ${{ secrets.ACTIONS_PUSH_TOKEN }}
      #   run: |
      #     git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"
      #     git config user.email "actions@github.com"
      #     git add -A

      #       echo "No changes to commit."
